conv_001.content: Hi Arjun, I'm planning my wedding and need a chef for the ceremony. Can we discuss the menu?
Hello Priya! Congratulations on your wedding! I'd love to help create a memorable feast. What cuisine are you considering?
We want a mix of North Indian and South Indian dishes for about 200 guests. Can you handle that?
Absolutely! I specialize in both cuisines. I can create a diverse menu with live counters too. When is the wedding date?
The wedding is in 6 weeks. We also need catering for the mehendi and sangeet ceremonies.
I've finalized the menu for your wedding. The catering will be exceptional!

conv_003.content: Hi Ravi, I need mehendi artist for my sangeet ceremony. Are you available next weekend?
Hello Kavya! Yes, I'm available. How many people need mehendi and what designs are you looking for?
Can you come early for the mehendi ceremony? We have 15 ladies.
